must_attend.event_name: ICML 2026 - Forty-Third International Conference on Machine Learning
must_attend.tagline: The premier global machine learning research and industry conference
must_attend.date_time: Dates to be announced in 2026 (likely mid-year)
must_attend.location: COEX Convention & Exhibition Center, Seoul, South Korea
must_attend.why_relevant: Largest, most prestigious ML conference with top researchers, investors, and industry experts. Ideal for AI/ML interest and investor networking.
must_attend.estimated_cost: Mid-tier academic and industry rates; details on website

must_attend.event_name: NextGen Data 2026 - Global Summit on AI, ML & Data Science
must_attend.tagline: Global summit for AI, machine learning, and data science advancements
must_attend.why_relevant: Focus on emerging AI/ML technologies with strong investor presence and global networking opportunities.
must_attend.expected_attendees_speakers: 800+ professionals including investors and tech leaders

must_attend.event_name: Third International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AIM-2026)
must_attend.tagline: Cutting-edge AI and ML research and industry panel discussions
must_attend.why_relevant: Brings global AI/ML experts and investors; strong sessions on future trends; mid-tier pricing fits budget.

should_attend.tagline: Unlocking AI and Information Management potential worldwide
should_attend.why_relevant: Focus on AI plus info management; industry leaders and investors present; virtual option increases access.

should_attend.tagline: Premier AI tech event with deep learning, NLP, and robotics
should_attend.why_relevant: Focus on deep learning and robotics aligns with AI interests; good networking with investors.

should_attend.tagline: Modern marketing and sales strategies for business leaders
should_attend.why_relevant: Large marketing event with investor presence; strong marketing topic relevance and networking.

nice_to_attend.event_name: Digital Marketing World Forum (DMWF) Expo North America 2025
nice_to_attend.tagline: Strategic digital marketing insights with AI and automation tracks
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: Relevant marketing focus with AI marketing overlap; good networking but smaller scale than INBOUND.

nice_to_attend.event_name: 2025 ANA Masters of B2B Marketing Conference
nice_to_attend.tagline: Masterclasses and case studies in B2B marketing
nice_to_attend.why_relevant: Focused on B2B marketing; useful if looking for specialized marketing insights; moderate networking.
